item.title: Day 83, Joshua 5-8
item.description: The people west of the Jordan heard of Israel’s Jordan crossing by God’s hand, and they all lost heart. Remarkably, this was the time when God told Joshua to circumcise the new generation of Israel, since they would be putting themselves in a very vulnerable state in the middle of enemy territory.
